title: Ep 293: Yannis Pappas Presents Karate Them
itunes:title: Ep 293: Yannis Pappas Presents Karate Them
description:
Yannis is Simon, not Garfunkel.  Bobby is Team Yannis. Khalyla's Mom meets Pete Sampras. We talk things that have never been googled, the greatest Michael Chang story, Karate Them, and the 'amicable' Hyena split.
